name: Mitsubishi Electric Europe B.V. Brussels Representative Office
goal: Contribute to the EU policies and legislation in the field of environment and other domains such as trade with impact on business with a particular focus on: energy efficiency, renewable energies, eco-design, recycling, global warming, waste and chemicals.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Ecodesign; Energy labelling; Fgas ; RoHS; REACH/CLP; WEEE; Circular Economy; Energy Union; Heating & Cooling Strategy; RES; EED; EPBD; Data protection law; EU-Japan EPA; Green Deal; Climate Law
